tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (DT That) (JJ sweet) (NN moment)) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (NP (DT a) (NN toddler)) (VP (VBZ accepts) (NP (NP (NNP Christ)) (PP (IN as) (NP (PRP$ their) (NN savior))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [accepts/VBZ dep>[moment/NN det>That/DT amod>sweet/JJ] advmod>when/WRB nsubj>[toddler/NN det>a/DT] dobj>[Christ/NNP nmod:as>[savior/NN case>as/IN nmod:poss>their/PRP$]] punct>./.]
